name: Soul Siphon
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space bar

Melee: Left click

Use Spell: Right click (Hold to charge, release to fire)

Details: Soul of Fire:

Right click to charge, release to shoot out a fireball. If the fireball hits either the floor or an enemy/wall close enough to the floor it will spawn a pool of lava which will continuously damage any enemies in it for the duration

Soul of Void:

The ring of light surrounding the black hole it is the event horizon. While holding right click, the black hole travels towards the mouse. All enemies will be continuously pulled towards the center, and if the player releases it while both they and at least one enemy are within the event horizon, they will teleport to the other side of the event horizon and damage all enemies within.

If just the player is present within at the instance of release, or if it is quickly tapped (~0.1s) then the player is flung towards the center of the black hole. This can be used like a double jump by tapping in the direction you want to move, and can be used twice while airborn before needing to recharge by landing.
